creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: image of Mt. Fuji behind water; framed by two trees at L and R; New Year's greeting kite adhered to back URQ
inscription: on back: [Dear Mr. Henry E. Robison / Best wishes for the New Year! / May 2002 bring you joy and prosperity! / Sincerely yours, Chizuko Yoshida / We have the exhibition \"A Japanese Legacy--Four generations of Yoshida Family Artists---\" 2/3~4/14/02 / The Minneapolis Institute of Arts/ Registration--Parks / 2400 Third Avenue South Minneapolis, Minnesota 55404]; URC: [A Happy New Year!]
title: Greeting Cards to H.E. Robison
